# primitiveDataElementSize

**Instance Property**

Sets the size, in bytes, of the data for each primitive in the primitive data buffer [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureGeometryDescriptor/primitiveDataBuffer] references.

## Declaration

```swift
var primitiveDataElementSize: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

This size needs to be at most [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureGeometryDescriptor/primitiveDataStride] in size and a multiple of 4 bytes.

This property defaults to 0 bytes.
title: primitiveDataElementSize
